sentences.sentence: 900m (12,795) the Paramo, Ecuador: Highland communities here are having to adapt fast to the changes.
sentences.translation: 厄瓜多尔帕拉莫(3900米)：目前，这里的高地社区被迫迅速适应气候变化。

sentences.sentence: In Ecuador, where only 3% of the water supplies come directly from glaciers, 15% of the water is held in the boggy pasturelands called the Paramo.
sentences.translation: 在厄瓜多尔，只有3%的水来自冰川，15%的水存在被称为帕拉莫沼泽似的牧草地。
